enablePrelaunchSplash.name: Enable Prelaunch Splash
enablePrelaunchSplash.description: Whether to show prelaunch splash for this app
enablePrelaunchSplash.description[zh_CN]: 是否为此应用显示预启动闪屏

lastWindowWidth.name: Last Window Width
lastWindowWidth.name[zh_CN]: 上次关闭时的窗口宽度
lastWindowWidth.description: Window width saved when the window was last closed
lastWindowWidth.description[zh_CN]: 记录窗口上次关闭时的宽度

lastWindowHeight.name: Last Window Height
lastWindowHeight.name[zh_CN]: 上次关闭时的窗口高度
lastWindowHeight.description: Window height saved when the window was last closed
lastWindowHeight.description[zh_CN]: 记录窗口上次关闭时的高度

splashThemeType.name: Splash Theme Type
splashThemeType.description: Splash theme preference: 0 follow system, 1 light, 2 dark
splashThemeType.description[zh_CN]: 闪屏主题偏好：0 跟随系统，1 亮色，2 暗色

splashDarkPalette.name: Splash Dark Palette
splashDarkPalette.description: Background color used when splash theme is dark
splashDarkPalette.description[zh_CN]: 闪屏使用暗色主题时的背景色

splashLightPalette.name: Splash Light Palette
splashLightPalette.description: Background color used when splash theme is light
splashLightPalette.description[zh_CN]: 闪屏使用亮色主题时的背景色
